video.title: Locked Up Abroad
video.synopsis: Experience the horrors and challenges facing travelers imprisoned abroad in this gritty documentary series from National Geographic.

episodes.synopsis: A Scottish chef moves to Saudi Arabia seeking a fresh start as a catering manager but gets sidetracked into an illegal alcohol-smuggling operation.
episodes.title: Saudi Bootlegger

episodes.synopsis: This episode chronicles the rise and fall of Henry Hill, the real-life New York mobster whose illustrious career inspired the movie "Goodfellas."
episodes.title: The Real Goodfella

episodes.synopsis: An Internet romance between a British man and a Filipino woman goes awry when her ex-husband tries to have them jailed per laws of the Philippines.
episodes.title: Forbidden Love

episodes.synopsis: Jeremy Khinoo heads across the border to Mexico to buy illegal prescription drugs but makes the huge mistake of trying pay for them with fake money.
episodes.title: Mexico Money Machine

episodes.synopsis: When 20-year-old Brigene gets caught smuggling heroin in her shoes, what should have been a dream vacation turns into a seven-year prison nightmare.
episodes.title: Heroin Sting

episodes.synopsis: Chris and Susan Chance get caught smuggling hashish and land in a tough Spanish prison, where former soldier Chris's combat training serves him well.
episodes.title: Daredevil Drug Runner

episodes.synopsis: Stephen Sutton accepts a tidy sum in exchange for transporting gold from Argentina to Australia -- unaware that the "gold" is actually cocaine.
episodes.title: The Cocaine Trap

episodes.synopsis: In need of cash, drug addict Robert Pringle strikes a deal with smugglers to carry cocaine out of Peru, but things go horribly awry for him.
episodes.title: Drug Dealer Revenge

episodes.synopsis: Brooklyn teen Vivian agrees to be a drug mule, assured the job will be easy because Colombian officials have been bribed. But nothing goes as planned.
episodes.title: Teenage Drug Smuggler

episodes.synopsis: A woman facing a criminal trial heads to Thailand for a quick getaway, but she and her travel partner land in a Thai prison for smuggling heroin.
episodes.title: Backstabbed in Thailand

episodes.synopsis: A stunt man and former football star doesn't realize he's been duped into smuggling opium into Pakistan and must face three brutal years in prison.
episodes.title: From Hollywood to Hell

episodes.synopsis: A magician performing in Bali learns he's having a child and needs cash fast, driving him to smuggle hash from Nepal -- and get snagged on the way.
episodes.title: The Juggler Smuggler

episodes.synopsis: A nursing student becomes addicted to crack when her boyfriend leaves her. To pay the bills, she smuggles cocaine into England.
episodes.title: Escape from Argentina

episodes.synopsis: In Iraq, a civilian truck driver for the U.S. military knows his life hangs by a thread when he is seized by insurgents who attack his convoy.
episodes.title: Highway to Hell

episodes.synopsis: A cocaine smuggler who is arrested and sentenced to serve time in one of Mexico's most brutal prisons attempts a death-defying escape.
episodes.title: Black Palace of Horrors

episodes.synopsis: After raising a family, a middle-aged woman struggles to survive on her own and turns to drug smuggling to pay her bills.
episodes.title: Cocaine Mule Mom

episodes.synopsis: A male nurse from the United Kingdom is incarcerated for homosexuality in Saudi Arabia, where being gay is classified as a capital crime.
episodes.title: Dangerous Liaisons

episodes.synopsis: A group of backpackers trekking in Colombia get more adventure than they bargained for when they're nabbed by armed guerrillas.
episodes.title: Colombian Kidnap

episodes.synopsis: A woman lands her dream job in a Caribbean nightclub, but things turn nightmarish when she and her husband are forced to smuggle cocaine.
episodes.title: Caribbean Nightmare

episodes.synopsis: An Iraqi soldier is called before Saddam Hussein's son, who demands that he become his body double. Refusing means he must choose death or escape.
episodes.title: Son of Saddam

episodes.synopsis: When Scott Campbell accompanies his father on a trip to China, he discovers after arrival that his dad is a professional drug smuggler.
episodes.title: My Dad the Smuggler

episodes.synopsis: When Duane Wollum is busted for smuggling cocaine in Nicaragua, authorities first believe that the drugs strapped to his body are a bomb.
episodes.title: I Am Not a Terrorist

episodes.synopsis: Hoping that his religious garb will make him invisible to customs agents, a Hasidic Jew tries smuggling cocaine and lands in a Brazilian prison.
episodes.title: Hasidic King of Coke

episodes.synopsis: New mother Susan Haglof may never see her adopted baby again when she's imprisoned in Egypt on human trafficking charges.
episodes.title: Not Without My Baby

episodes.synopsis: With a fellow inmate, Californian Tom Hanway escapes from a Chilean prison, but the path to freedom is more dangerous than any jail.
episodes.title: Chilean Prison Break

episodes.synopsis: Two British backpackers hunting for orchids are taken captive by guerrillas when they attempt a dangerous crossing from Panama to Colombia.
episodes.title: The Orchid Hunters

episodes.synopsis: An Irish plumber hoping to smuggle cocaine into Dublin to support his family lands in a Venezuelan prison.
episodes.title: Venezuela Hustle

episodes.synopsis: While in Somalia to cover the refugee crisis, journalists Nigel Brennan and Amanda Lindhout are abducted and held for $3 million ransom.
episodes.title: Nightmare in Somalia

episodes.synopsis: Busted for attempting to smuggle heroin out of Thailand, Angela Carnegie rethinks her life when she cares for a drug-addicted fellow inmate.
episodes.title: Busted in Bangkok

episodes.synopsis: In 1976, American Jerry Amster is sent to a Soviet work camp for attempting to smuggle heroin into Russia.
episodes.title: Escape from the Gulag

episodes.synopsis: The longest-held POW in Vietnam history endures starvation, illness, torture, solitude and despair -- and forms a historic friendship.
episodes.title: Vietnam POWs

episodes.synopsis: A Florida salesman smuggles crocodiles, snakes and tarantulas around the world -- until he gets busted in Belize and returned to U.S. marshals.
episodes.title: Snakes on a Plane

episodes.synopsis: A British stockbroker living in Phoenix uses, then deals ecstacy. When a Mafia boss takes offense, he emigrates again -- to a criminal underworld.
episodes.title: Raving Arizona

episodes.synopsis: Kidnapped, sealed in an underground room and kept barely alive while his Iraqi captors demand a giant ransom, a Navy veteran fights for his survival.
episodes.title: Buried Alive

episodes.synopsis: Real-life characters portrayed in the Oscar-winning film tell the true tale of how CIA agents rescued six American hostages by posing as a movie crew.
episodes.title: The Real Argo

episodes.synopsis: Five Americans caught smuggling a ton of marijuana try to escape a violent Mexican prison, tunneling through concrete using a butter knife and rocks.
episodes.title: Mexican Prison Escape

episodes.synopsis: A drug smuggler in Maui lands in a Peruvian prison called "the House of the Devil," where escape attempts are expected but usually fatal.
episodes.title: Hippie Mafia

episodes.synopsis: The leader of a Las Vegas crime ring is caught and testifies against the mob. He hides in the witness protection program, but now he's speaking out.
episodes.title: Vegas Mobster

episodes.synopsis: A desperate thief steals radios to help support his family, then follows a criminal path to a place where he finds his life and freedom threatened.
episodes.title: Fast, Furious and Busted

episodes.synopsis: A British schoolteacher agrees to help an old friend with a drug deal and finds a new career. He soon runs a huge operation and becomes a wanted man.
episodes.title: Hunting Mr. Nice
